altTitles.ja: ストーカー×ストーカー

description.en: Getta and Taiyo, college students who were close friends. One day, Taiyo finds out that he was stalking Getta. However, Getta is a stalker of the sun, and collects the baby teeth of the sun.

title.en: Reikan Aru Youkya to Kowai Inkya

altTitles.ja: 霊感ある陽キャと怖い陰キャ

altTitles.ja-ro: Reikan Aru Yōkya to Kowai Inkya

altTitles.en: A Spiritual Positive Character and a Scary Negative Character
A Spiritual Extrovert and a Scary Introvert

altTitles.vi: Thằng hướng ngoại nhìn thấy được ma và thằng hướng nội trông sợ vỗn lài

description.en: Daily story about a spiritual positive character and a scary negative character

Ye Wu took just two days to build his foundation, a peerless genius. Excited to leave seclusion, he was shocked to discover that two thousand years had passed, and his sect had long ceased to exist. Helplessly stepping out of the mountains, he found a world that was terrifyingly unfamiliar. Mighty figures could ‘fly’ through the air from afar, and powerful cultivators were in control from behind the scenes through ‘mobile phones.’ Ye Wu trembled with astonishment, utterly shaken. Little did he know that he might be the last cultivator on Earth, already unmatched in the mortal realm!

altTitles.vi: Ánh sao nơi đầu ngón tay cậu

altTitles.ja: バンドオブチルドレン

description.en: A boy called Luka was suddenly summoned to another world by two young girls, the swordfighter Nagi and the Wizard Stella. They wanted him, who has the qualities of a healer, to join their party.
description.ja: 謎の声に呼ばれ異世界に召喚された少年、ルカ。彼を召喚したのは幼い二人の少女、剣士のナギと魔法使いのステラだった。彼女たちが言うにはヒーラーの素質があるルカを自分たちの仲間にするために召喚したらしい。当然心当たりのないルカは何とか元の世界に戻れないか機をうかがっていたが最強の剣士になって最高のギルドを作り魔王を倒すという途方もない夢を堂々と語るナギを見て彼女たちの仲間になる決意を固める。そして大きな夢への第一歩、始まりの森の主である巨大蜘蛛の討伐へと三人は乗り出すのだった。

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật Webtoon  Na Kang Lim

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
description.vi: Na Kang Lim, nam sinh trung học bình trường rất thích đọc webtoon. Một ngày, đã có chuyện bất ngờ xảy ra, nữ chính từ bộ webtoon cậu hay đọc đã xuất hiện ngoài đợi thật. Những sự cố trong webtoon khiến cô ấy rơi vào khủng hoảng, nhưng nhân vật chính lại không có ở đây để giải cứu nữ chính! Và Kang Lim đã trở thành nhân vật chính cùng với kí ước từ bộ truyện và khả năng du hành thời gian để cứu nữ chính

altTitles.ja: キャンドルと魔女

description.en:
In the forest, the young girl met a cheerful demon with a candle head.

"Why are you alone? Why are you so filthy?"
"...Your flames are pretty."

"Eh? I like you. Form a contract with me."

What awaited the girl was a warm meal and a soft bed-?!
The crazy demon, Candle, and the mysterious girl, Little Mum, begin their strange life together.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu

altTitles.ja: 魔王と竜王に育てられた少年は学園生活を無双するようです

altTitles.en: The Boy Raised by the Demon Queen and the Dragon Queen Has No Rival

description.en: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
description.ja:
「魔王」と「竜王」の力を継ぐ少年の無双ファンタジー！
才能ゼロの少年ルイシャは、ある日謎の穴に落ちてしまう。その先にいたのは、巨乳で美人の「魔王」と褐色幼女の「竜王」！　2人から300年の修行を受け、少年は魔族と竜族の力に覚醒する！　ちょっとだけHな少年の英雄譚が、タテ読みフルカラーで開幕！

altTitles.en: コイバナ! 恋せよ花火

description.en: Due to some mishaps during her entrance exams, Hanabi Marui finds herself entering a school of mostly boys. This is a problem for our heroine, as she has a huge disgust for the male gender. But then she meets someone who slowly turns her world upside down. This series follows the trials she and her friends go through with love.
description.es: Debido a algunos contratiempos durante sus exámenes de ingreso, Hanabi Marui encuentra a sí misma entrando a una escuela de la mayoría varones. Esto es un problema para nuestra heroína, ya que tiene un enorme disgusto para el género masculino. Pero entonces conoce a alguien que gira lentamente su mundo al revés. Esta serie sigue los ensayos que ella y sus amigos van a través del amor.

description.en:
A senior disciple from a countryside martial academy returns as the world’s best! Dragged into a brutal political war, senior disciple ‘Hyeok Musang’ didn’t return after the bloody war ended. No one knew whether he was still alive for 5 years.

Upon barely returning to his hometown, he found his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy being persecuted and destroyed by a third-rate gang.

He thought he could live peacefully with his fellow members after winning the war but seeing the miserable state of his master and fellow disciples, he was filled with anger and guilt.

With the return of the senior disciple, everyone thought things would get better but only for a moment. Things were still happening in his hometown of Yangzhou County. Was the war really over? The head disciple raises his sword against the dangers threatening his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy.

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

altTitles.en: Grandpa Samurai and Granddaughter of the Supreme

description.en: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"

altTitles.en: I Became a Student at the Transcension Academy
I Became a Student at Transcendental Academy

description.en:
After a hundred years of monsters, it’s become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And that’s just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with history’s most legendary warriors. As he levels up, he’s soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.
description.ko:
돌아가신 부모님의 빚을 갚으며 헌터가 되기 위해 헌터학원에 갈 돈을 모아왔던 서준은
불의의 사고로 모은 돈을 전부 수술비로 써버린다.
절망에 빠진 순간

띠링-!

이상한 광고가 재생되었다.

[야 너도 초월자 될 수 있어!]

더 이상 잃을 것도 없다, 회원 가입!!

[김서준 님 초월자 학원에 오신 걸 환영합니다].

내가 다니는 헌터학원은 다른 학원들과 '차원'이 다르다!

헌터도 학원을 다니는 헌터 사교육 시대!

야 너도 초월자 될 수 있어!

description.en:
Short manga posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter. 

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.fr: Jusqu'à ce que la mort nous sépare

altTitles.th: เนตรปริศนาล่าทรชน

altTitles.ja: 死がふたりを分かつまで

description.en:
The future is a great unknown. Throughout history, those who have been graced with the power to read it have been sought by many. In this day and age, the term "prophet" is outdated. "Precog," as in precognition, is the modern term.  
  
Yet when the powers of precognition is graced upon a young girl named Tohyama Haruka, she is sought after by a powerful organization. Utilizing her powers, Haruka makes contact with Hijikata Mamoru, a blind swordsman. When cornered by her captors, Haruka proposes an outrageous condition to Mamoru. Haruka wants Mamoru to protect her until death do them apart.  
  
[Song Ji-Hyoung is the real name of the artist who uses the pen name Double S]
description.vi: Một cô bé có thể nhìn thấy trước tương lai, 1 món quà từ thượng đế hay là nỗi bất hạnh? Cô bị bọn yakuza truy đuổi nhằm mưu lợi cá nhân và cô muốn thoát khỏi tay bọn chúng. Dựa vào năng lực của mình, cô đã tìm đến một người đàn ông bị mù mắt nhưng cực kỳ mạnh mẽ, người có thể giúp cô trốn thoát…

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity III: The Stage of Carnage, Shimousa - Seven Duels of Swordmasters

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点３／亜種並行世界 屍山血河舞台 下総国 英霊剣豪七番勝負

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten 3 / Ashu Heikou Sekai: Shizan Ketsuga Butai, Shimousa no Kuni - Eirei Kengou Nanaban Shoubu

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ -Эпопея Остатка- Турнир Семи Героев-Мастеров Меча

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng III – Vũ Đài Núi Thây Sông Máu – Trận Chiến Thứ Bảy Ở Shimosha

description.en:
Fans of Fate/Grand Order—rejoice! A new side story appears...with all the twists and turns you might expect! Epic of Remnant is here!

---

Note: The chapters in this title follow magazine release numbering.
description.ru: Манга-адаптация одноименного сюжетного акта игры Fate/Grand Order. Фуджимару теряет сознание и, придя в себя, понимает, что очутилась в Японии периода Эдо. Там она встречает Миямото Мусаши, которую когда-то уже видела во сне. Исторически Мусаши был мужчиной, который прославился на весь мир как мастер меча. Почему же теперь их двое, мужчина и женщина с одним именем? Настало время начала Семи Поединков Мастеров Меча!

title.en: "Hitokiri" Shoujo Koushaku Reijou no Goei ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 『人斬り』少女、公爵令嬢の護衛になる

altTitles.en: "Hitokiri" Girl Becomes Bodyguard for the Duke's Daughter

description.en: Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri". Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution: "If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"
description.ja: 「護衛が必要なら、たった今から雇われてあげるけど」国家に嵌められ『人斬り』の汚名を背負ったことで逃亡をしているシュリネの前に、現れた一人の公爵令嬢・ルーテシアとその侍女・シュリネ。緊急事態での救いの手を取るルーテシア。

altTitles.zh: 顶级气运，悄悄修炼千年

altTitles.en: Top Tier Providence- Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years
Top Tier Providence: Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years

description.en:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one…

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner.
A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods aren’t that powerful after all!

title.en: The Story of How My Childhood Friend Gave Me Chocolate on Valentine's Day after I Didn't Get Any from Anyone

altTitles.ja: バレンタイン誰からも貰えなかった俺に幼なじみがチョコをくれた話

altTitles.ja-ro: Valentine Darekara mo Moraenakatta Ore ni Osananajimi ga Choco o Kureta Hanashi

title.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Gamer

altTitles.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Player

description.en: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

altTitles.ja: 青山ケイハウス

description.en:
Park Tae Jun's exciting new work! An impure cohabitation!  
  
[Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000413)  
[Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/khouse/list?title_no=1502)

Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

altTitles.vi: Bạn từ nhỏ kể từ ngày hôm nay

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

altTitles.en: Only I Farm in the Dungeon
I'm the Only One Farming in the Dungeon

altTitles.es-la: Cultivando en la torre en solitario
Cultivando a solas en la torre

description.en: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
description.it: Un giorno, una misteriosa torre apparve improvvisamente in città. La gente decise di chiamarla dungeon, e sebbene fosse pieno di asperità e mostri pericolosi, era anche una terra di opportunità, dove erano in attesa innumerevoli tesori. Quando Sejun, un giovane che vive una vita normale, viene invitato per caso nel dungeon sotterraneo, è entusiasta all'idea di diventare ricco, ma è rimasto bloccato in una zona nascosta della torre misteriosa. Tutto quello che ha sono alcuni semi e il suo corpo. Ora Sejun deve coltivare, raccogliere risorse e capire come sopravvivere!
description.es-la: Un día, una torre misteriosa apareció de repente en la ciudad. La gente decidió llamarla mazmorra, y aunque estaba llena de un terreno irregular y monstruos peligrosos, también era una tierra de oportunidades, donde aguardaban innumerables tesoros. Cuando Sejun, un joven que vive una vida ordinaria, es invitado por casualidad a la mazmorra, está emocionado ante la perspectiva de hacerse rico, pero se encuentra varado en un área oculta de la misteriosa torre. Todo lo que tiene son unas pocas semillas y su cuerpo. ¡Ahora, Sejun debe cultivar, recolectar recursos y descubrir su propia estrategia de supervivencia!
description.pt-br: Sejun, o típico azarão de Seul não esperava se tornar um Fazendeiro quando tropeçou e foi transportado para a famosa Dungeon, cheia de missões, de monstros e recompensas misteriosas. No entanto, lá estava ele, como um agricultor cultivando e vendendo seus frutos engenhosamente, enquanto concluía inúmeras missões que surgiam em seu caminho. Será que Sejun conseguirá sair da Dungeon que está preso? Pelo menos ele tem o que é necessário: otimismo, engenhosidade e um grupo de leais amigos peludinhos.

description.en: Regret is the bane of old men. When aging Alliance Lord Hajin Cheon of the Grand Martial Alliance reflects on his immense legacy, he finds that he recalls little of his deeds or even the lives of his closest advisors. Stricken by a mysterious ailment, Hajin suddenly passes away only to wake up in the body of Ridan Byeok, heir to the Byeok Clan of swordsmen. The only problem is, Ridan is a well-known wastrel, the polar opposite of the virtuous and stern Hajin. Righting the wrongs of his predecessor, Hajin begins to uncover the truth behind his death…
description.pt-br:
Tian Hejin, popularmente conhecido como o Líder da Aliança de Sangue de Ferro, acorda no corpo de “Bi Liduan” – a desgraça de sua família! Seu hobby é apostar, e ele foi trancado em um armazém escuro por muito tempo. Da noite para o dia, Tian Hejin passou de ser o maior especialista de Jianghu para o maior lixo possível.

Vamos começar do zero e realizar tudo o que não pude alcançar em minha vida passada.

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

altTitles.ja: 奇縁 〜 ゲームと現実がリンクする

altTitles.en: My Lucky Encounter From the Game Turned Into Reality

description.en:
"Who says revenge is vain? It's so fun!"

In a world where magic co-exists with the rule of nobles, Adrian Lawrence seemed to have gotten lucky in life as the second son of a viscount. Despite this, Adrian is an outcast in a home controlled by his scheming step-mother and half-brother, who are set on ousting him. 

Little do they know that Adrian plays the game Chronicle Online, where he possesses great powers that can also be used in reality! 

With heirship to the viscounty up for grabs, can Adrian use his powers to level up his real life?

title.en: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World

description.en:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!

title.en: Peaceful Camping Life in Another World

altTitles.es-la: Acampando en otro Mundo: buscandole el sazon a la vida

altTitles.en: Healing Life Through Camping In Another World

description.en: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?

altTitles.en: I Built the Club of Longevity
I Created the Club of Immortality

description.en: Chen Li works at Mo city, he works there every day with no hope to be seen for the future… until one night. Chen Li obtains a special ability, an ability to buy “Time” and “Lifespan” from people, sell “Time” and “Lifespan” and also let things speed up “Time leap” and slow down “exhaustion time”. So he begins to build a top-class “Lifespan club”!
description.pt-br: Chen Li trabalha na cidade Mo, ele trabalha todo o dia pensando que não há esperanças para o seu futuro... até que uma noite Chen Li consegue uma habilidade especial, a habilidade de comparar e vender tempo de vida, junto a isso ele pode acelerar o próprio tempo e o tempo de outras coisas utilizando o tempo de vida que ele tem

altTitles.en: Chronicles of the Martial God's Return

altTitles.ja: 武神帰還録

altTitles.es-la: Crónicas del Regreso del Dios marcial

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas do Retorno do Deus Marcial

description.en:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)
description.fr: Le sixième chef-d’œuvre du genre Wuxia qui comblera vos attentes, tout comme les [Chroniques du retour du troisième degré], [La conquête de la faction céleste] et les [Chroniques des sept dragons et des sept démons]. [Chroniques du retour du Dieu Martial] Le Démon Martial Divin Ultime, Dan Woohyun, a été enfermé car il était trop fort pour que le monde puisse le gérer. Après un millénaire, il a été libéré de son sceau et avait l’impression que tout n’avait pas de sens alors qu’il errait dans les ruelles… Au moment où il s’est écroulé parce qu’il en avait marre du monde, une petite main est apparue devant lui. « Qu’est-ce que c’est ? » a demandé Dan Woohyun. « Une boulette ! » lui a été répondu. C’était la première fois de sa vie que quelqu’un était gentil avec lui sans aucune intention impure, et cela a changé son destin. Voici les chroniques d’un dieu martial qui a traversé mille ans de temps et d’espace !
description.ko:
그 누구도 맞설 수 없는 최흉의 인재(人災),

무극신마, 단우현.

이대로 영원히 세상위에 군림할 줄 알았다.
중원의 질서를 지키는 팔선들에 의해 동정호에 봉인을 당하기 전까지는….

세월이 흘러 천 년 후.
천 년이라는 시간은 단우현에게서 살심을 없애기에 충분했다.
변해버린 세상, 아는 사람이라고는 아무도 없는 고독, 남은 것은 허탈함과 공허함 뿐.

“바람이 흐르듯 세월도 흐르는구나. 정말로 아무것도 남은 것이 없어.”

목적도, 삶의 의지도 잃고 정처없이 떠도는 단우현 앞에 나타난 자그마한 소녀. 화소미.
누구에게도 기댈 곳 없어 보이는 소녀에게 단우현은 동질감을 느끼며 점점 마음의 문을 열기 시작한다.

“나는 단우현이다. 나와 함께 가자꾸나.”

얼음장 같은 마음을 가진 무신과 귀엽고 순수한 소녀의
마음을 따뜻하게 녹여 줄 평범하지 않은 한 가족의 중원 생활 이야기.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYB8b4SxrLo)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891)
description.zh: 因嗜杀被封印千年的武神苏醒归来，这一世，他却只想安安静静的养女儿...
description.pt-br: Dono de um talento inigualável, Dan Woohyeon. Ele pensou que governaria o mundo eternamente, até que foi selado. Milhares de anos se passaram. O mundo mudou e as únicas coisas que restaram foram o desespero e o vazio. “À medida que o vento flui, o tempo também. Realmente não há mais nada.” Uma garotinha aparece na frente de Dan Woohyeon, que não perdeu o propósito nem a vontade de viver.  Dan Woohyeon sente-se unido com uma garota que parece não ter ninguém em quem se apoiar e gradualmente começa a abrir as portas do seu coração. “Meu nome é Dan Woohyeon. Quer vir comigo?” Começa a jornada de um deus marcial com um coração gelado e uma garota fofa e pura.

altTitles.ja: 限界独身女子(26)ごはん

altTitles.vi: Bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị (26) độc thân

altTitles.es-la: Comidas de despedida de soltera de 26 años
El sufrimiento de una Doomer no amada de 26 años

altTitles.en: The Meals Of A Single Woman (26) At Her Limit
The Meals Of a 26 Year Old Single At Her Limit
The Suffering of a 26 Year Old Unloved Female Doomer

altTitles.pt-br: O Sofrimento de uma Doomer de 26 Anos Não Amada
Refeições de uma mulher solteira no limite (26 anos)

description.en: Hiiragi-san is a single woman who is exhausted from work and life. No matter how depressed she is, she always ends up hungry.
description.ja:
鬱、孤独、たまに飯。
仕事につかれ、生活につかれた限界独身女子の柊さん。どんなに憂鬱でも、おなかだけは空いてしまうようです。
description.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày cùng những bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị độc thân thất nghiệp chán đời.
description.es-la: La Sr. Hiiragi, es una chica marginalmente soltera que está cansada del trabajo y la vida. No importa cuán deprimido esté, mi estómago parece estar vacío.
description.pt-br: Hiiragi-san é uma mulher solteira, exausta do trabalho e da vida. Não importa o quão deprimida ela esteja, ela sempre acaba ficando com fome.

description.en:
The maniac who was crazy about all kinds of fields such as military and steampunk had been reincarnated. However, his father was King Sejong the Great?
The mania-wise king and his crazy maniac son. Along with the ministers, and countless humans who were getting exploited.
Even today, the night of Joseon was filled with the light of overtime.

altTitles.vi: Tụi mình không có hẹn hò

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja: 藤村くんメイツ

description.en: Fujimura is a loner delinquent at his school. Feared by his classmates since the first day of high school, he's had no friends and usually ditches class. But even his standoffish nature can't hold up when a class representative with a few screws loose comes after him! And another two class representatives. They're a few cards short of a full deck too. (Actually, he's more like the tsukkomi in a world of boke.)

Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

title.en: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World

altTitles.en: Modern Man Falling Into the World of Murim
A Modern Man Who Got Transmigrated to Murim

altTitles.es-la: Un hombre moderno en el Murim

description.en: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

altTitles.ja: カラーレス

description.en:
A gray Earth, where humanity was transformed into deformed beings. The curtains open on an action series where the goal is to recover a lost world, with the help of a strange-looking gun!
 
An enormous solar flare caused the planet to lose all of its colors. Humans are deformed and declining in numbers. The key to reclaiming the old world lies within the power hidden in *color*, and one *girl*. Knowing that the few remnants of colors in the world yield a great power, Avidia, who is conducting research while protecting a girl named Chie, uses the colors to expand his own power, and throws himself in a battle against the Cult.

---
A cosmic disaster changed the Earth forever, stripping away every last drop of color from the world. Mankind also changed: the familiar human face is almost forgotten in a world now populated wholly by mutants. Against the backdrop of a moody urban landscape, a lone-wolf investigator named Avidia relies on both his wits and extraordinary gun to hunt down the world's last hidden scraps of color. He soon crosses paths with a very special girl -- one who just might hold the key to bringing back what the world has lost.
description.es:
Una Tierra gris, donde la humanidad se transformó en seres deformes. Se abren las cortinas de una serie de acción en la que el objetivo es recuperar un mundo perdido, con la ayuda de un arma de aspecto extraño.  
  
Una enorme erupción solar hizo que el planeta perdiera todos sus colores. Los humanos están deformados y disminuyendo en número. La clave para recuperar el viejo mundo está en el poder oculto en el 「color」, y en una「Chica」. Sabiendo que los pocos restos de colores en el mundo producen un gran poder, Avidia, que está llevando a cabo una investigación mientras protege a una chica llamada Chie, utiliza los colores para expandir su propio poder, y se lanza a una batalla contra el Culto.
description.fr: Suite à une éruption solaire d'une ampleur sans précédent, la Terre a perdu ses couleurs. L'humanité, victime de mutations génétiques, est sur le déclin. Malgré tout, il subsiste encore des fragments infimes de couleurs dans le monde, et ils pourraient bien être la clé qui rendra à la Terre sa splendeur d'antan, tout comme une mystérieuse jeune fille Avidya, qui étudie la prodigieuse énergie contenue dans les couleurs, va devoir mettre sa vie en jeu pour protéger la jeune Tchié de l'Église, un culte qui cherche à s'emparer de ce pouvoir pour étendre son influence.
description.ja:
『シドニアの騎士』『人形の国』弐瓶勉先生、絶賛!!
「心配になるぐらい人間が出てきませんが大好きです。」


灰色の地球、
異形化が進んだ人類ーー。
失われた世界を取り戻す
異形ガンアクション、開幕!!

極大太陽フレアの影響で色素を失った地球。
異形化し、衰退の一途をたどる人類。
かつての世界を取り戻す鍵は
「色」に秘められた力と一人の「少女」。

世界に僅かに残された「色」の残滓に
巨大な力が宿っていることを知り
研究を進めるアヴィディアは、
少女・智慧を守りながら
「色」の力を使い勢力を拡大する
「教団」との戦いに身を投じることとなる。
description.pt:
Uma Terra cinza, onde a humanidade foi transformada em seres deformados. As cortinas abrem-se em uma série de ação onde o objetivo é recuperar um mundo perdido, com a ajuda de uma arma de estranha aparência.  
  
Uma enorme erupção solar fez o planeta perder todas as suas cores. Humanos estão deformados e declinando em números. A chave para reaver o velho mundo reside no poder escondido na “cor”, e uma “garota”. Sabendo que os poucos resquícios de cores no mundo carregam um grande poder, Avidia, que está investigando enquanto protege uma garota de nome Chie, usa as cores para expandir seu próprio poder, e se atira em uma batalha contra O Culto.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KKreptilian)
description.uk:
Сіра земля, на якій людство перетворилося на понівечених істот. Мета полягає в тому, щоб відновити втрачений світ за допомогою химерної зброї!

Потужний сонячний спалах змусив планету втратити всі свої кольори. Тіла людей сильно деформувалися, і їхня чисельність поступово падає. Ключем до відновлення старого світу є сила, прихована у "кольорі" та "дівчині". Авідія, який вивчає факт знаходження величезної сили в залишках "кольору", принагідно використовуючи її задля захисту дівчини на ім'я Чіє та розширення своєї сили, зійшовся у запеклій битві проти "культу".
description.pt-br:
Uma Terra cinzenta, onde a humanidade foi transformada em seres deformados. Abrem-se as cortinas de uma série de ação onde o objetivo é recuperar um mundo perdido, com a ajuda de uma arma de aspeto estranho!
 
Uma enorme erupção solar fez com que o planeta perdesse todas as suas cores. Os humanos estão deformados e a diminuir em número. A chave para recuperar o velho mundo está no poder escondido na *cor* e numa *menina*. Sabendo que os poucos restos de cores no mundo geram um grande poder, Avidia, que está a fazer pesquisa enquanto protege uma rapariga chamada Chie, usa as cores para expandir o seu próprio poder e lança-se numa batalha contra o Culto.

---
Uma catástrofe cósmica mudou a Terra para sempre, retirando do mundo até à última gota de cor. A humanidade também mudou: o rosto humano familiar está quase esquecido num mundo agora totalmente povoado por mutantes. Tendo como pano de fundo uma paisagem urbana sombria, um investigador solitário chamado Avidia confia na sua inteligência e na sua extraordinária arma para caçar os últimos restos de cor escondidos no mundo. Ele logo se cruza com uma garota muito especial - uma que pode ser a chave para trazer de volta o que o mundo perdeu.

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム エンゲージ

description.en:
Jo Ja-Hyun (Jay) is the student president of Taeyang (Sunny) High. He is not just a smart student but an extreme biker with high techniques. As you follow his bike, you will meet his friends, love, and adventures.

---

**Contents:**
- **Season 1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue + Special (0-65)
- **Season 2.1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue (66-130)
- **Season 2.2:** 117 Chapters (131-257)
- **Season 3:** 128 Chapters (258-375)
- **Season 4:** 53 Chapters (Ongoing) (376-)
description.fr:
Nous suivons l’histoire de Jay un jeune lycéen étudiant et président du conseil des élèves de la Sunny High.

Alors qu’il était en train de faire du vélo, ce dernier se fera rapidement repérer par Minu, membre de la Zephyrus Crew, un groupe de cycliste. Le jeune homme ayant été impressionné par les compétences de Jay tentera de le recruter dans son équipe, chose que le président du conseil des élèves refusera catégoriquement.

Voyant les nombreux refus de ce dernier, Minu abandonnera l’idée de le recruter et lui proposera simplement de faire une course contre TJ, également membre de la Zephyrus Crew. Alors que Jay s’apprêtait à décliné son offre, Minu lui dira que ce fameux TJ a insulté son vélo, disant qu’il ne s’agissait que d’un tas de ferraille. Fou de rage, Jay acceptera finalement de prendre part à la course…
description.pt: Jo Ja-Hyun (Jay) é o Presidente do Conselho estudantil da Taeyang (Sunny) High. ele não é somente um aluno inletigente mas um ciclista incrível com ótimas técnicas. enquanto você segue a bicicleta dele, irá conhecer seus amigos, amor e as aventuras.

title.en: The Delivery Man From Martial World

description.en: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal “gates.” There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man…

altTitles.ja: 麺面むすび

altTitles.en: Men Men Musubi and Other Stories

description.en:
In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans… Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge.

description.fr:
Alors qu’il étudiait assidument les arts martiaux, Woosung a vu son maître périr sous ses yeux, condamné par jalousie et injustice. Lorsqu’il le suit à son tour dans la mort, il fait une promesse : celle de se venger coûte que coûte ! Et cette vengeance arrivera peut-être plus tôt qu’il ne l’imagine... car Woosung vient de se réincarner dans le corps d’un candidat à l’école des démons célestes. Un entraînement terrible l’attend, où seuls les prétendants les plus déterminés survivront. A la clé ? La maîtrise des arts démoniaques ! Seront-ils les armes de la vengeance de Woosung ?

description.ko:
‘평생 협의를 외치셨던 분이 이리 가셨습니까…!'

금지된 마공을 익혔다는 누명을 쓰고 죽임 당한
창존문의 계승자와 제자 혁운성.

정파의 위선자들에 의한 비참하고 억울한 죽음…  

운성이 죽음을 맞이하는 순간, 
창존문의 신물이 빛을 발하며 새로운 인생이 주어진다. 

바로, 마교 수련생 구백 호로서의 인생이! 

정파와 마교, 두 개의 정체성.
그러나 목표는 하나, 복수뿐! 

운명을 받아들이고 원한을 되씹으며 운성은 무공을 쌓고
그렇게 복수의 시간도 차츰 다가오는데….


마교를 장악하고 정파의 위선자들을 처단하라!
생사를 건 난관 속에 성장하는 구백 호 운성의 복수 활극! 

일황 작가의 인기 무협 소설 <신마경천기>의 웹툰화.

description.ru:
«Лишь твои поступки поддерживают гармонию в жизни… Именно на это ты должен опираться!..» Преемник секты Искусного Копья и его ученик Хёк Ун-Сон были застигнуты за изучением запретного Демонического искусства и в последствии были наказаны смертью. «Жалкие лицемеры, опирающиеся на устои своей секты!..» Но в момент, когда Хёк Ун-Сон предстал перед вратами в ад, артефакт секты Искусного Копья стал излучать странный свет, одаривший юношу новой жизнью. Две противоположности: секта, исповедующая лишь добро, и секта, погрязшая в изучении демонических техник. Приняв свою судьбу и вспоминая всю ту злобу, что накопилась в нём, Ун-Сон начинает свой путь к становлению боевым мастером, чтобы потом отомстить… Отомстить ублюдкам, что предали его! История о жизни и смерти, о добре и зле, о случайных встречах и удаче… Начинается!

Even Though I Possessed a Villain, I Still Want to Raise a Cat

altTitles.ru: Мной завладел злодей, но я всё ещё хочу вырастить кота

description.en:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

description.en:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.
